author: Hongru Fan; Juan Liu; Liwei Li; Deyan Yang; Yonghong Wu; Yong Fang; Guowei Tian; Jing Li; Fan Zhang; Wan Pan; Quan Fang; Taibo Chen; Kangan Cheng; Liqun He; Zhongwei Cheng; Peng Gao; Chunfeng Yi
title: Myocardial injury is associated with in-hospital mortality of confirmed or suspected COVID-19 in Wuhan, China: A single center retrospective cohort study
